title: Light Armour Proficiency

rmour Proficiency Information

Wearing Light Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent you from casting spells.

How to unlock Light Armour Proficiency

Light Armour Proficiency can be acquired by

Barbarian (Lvl 1) Bard Lvl 1 Cleric Lvl 1 Druid Lvl 1 Fighter Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Warlock Lvl 1 Paladin Lvl 1 Githyanki Shield Dwarf
